entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with a few rain showers this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 26 April 2023
